fields.label: Retina Logo
fields.name: retina_logo
fields.instructions: Must be double the size of the regular logo.

fields.label: Favicon
fields.name: favicon
fields.instructions: Square image at least 192 pixels wide/high.

fields.label: Theme Color
fields.name: theme_color
fields.instructions: Primary theme color hex code. Primarily for >= Windows 8 metro layout.

fields.label: Facebook Share Image
fields.name: facebook_share_image
fields.instructions: Recommended resolution is 1200 x 630 pixels.  Can't be smaller than 200 x 200 pixels.

fields.label: LinkedIn Share Image
fields.name: linkedin_share_image
fields.instructions: Can't be larger than 180 x 110 pixels.  Recommended size is as close to the maximum as possible.

fields.label: Twitter Share Image
fields.name: twitter_share_image
fields.instructions: Square image between 60 and 120 pixels wide/high.

fields.label: Require Authentication for WordPress REST API
fields.name: disable_wordpress_rest_api

fields.label: Custom Data
fields.name: custom_data
fields.instructions: See http://schema.org for allowed data and formatting instructions
